scripts.vercel-install: corepack enable && corepack prepare yarn@4.9.1 --activate && yarn set version berry && echo 'nodeLinker: node-modules' > .yarnrc.yml && yarn install
scripts.vercel-build: if [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" != "main" ]; then echo 'Skipping build on non-main branch âœ…'; exit 0; fi && next build
